description:
A game of Miniature Garden Tag abruptly begins at the outdoor school.
Will Hanako, Hibari, Botan, Hibiki, and Ren of "Team Four Leaf Clover" be able to find the wooden statues they carved and safely make it to the end of the game?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 19 août, une classe de montagne heureuse
